name: Slime Mayhem Beta 0.08
description:
A  & D are the controls < >, 'Space' is for jumping, Shift is a taunt. If you’d like to Pause the game or quit or go back to the main menu, Use the key ‘Esc’

THE NEWEST FEATURES 

> Fixed level 4 and 3

> Bug fixes

> Re-Designed game menu/pause menu

> Made Level 6 more playable

(IF THERE IS ANY ERROR OR ISSUE LEAVING, TRY SHUTTING DOWN YOUR PC, AND PLEASE REPORT IT IN THE COMMENTS.)
